basics.summary: With over a decade of expertise as a full-stack developer, I specialize in architecting and implementing robust digital solutions that seamlessly integrate front-end and back-end functionalities. My extensive experience enables me to tackle complex challenges with creativity and efficiency, delivering cutting-edge solutions that exceed expectations.

work.name: Novatec Software GmbH
work.summary: As a Full Stack Developer, I developed and maintained over 10 applications, encompassing both backend-only and full-stack projects. Leveraging Java and Kotlin for backend development and Angular for frontend interfaces, I ensured seamless integration and optimal performance. My contributions resulted in high-quality, user-centric applications that met client expectations. Also contributed to some internal charity projects and hackathons.

work.name: Werfen
work.summary: As a Developer at this leading health tech company, I contributed to a vital application's development, utilizing Java for backend and Angular for frontend. With stringent FDA regulations in mind, ensuring high-quality code was paramount. My efforts ensured compliance while exceeding industry standards and client expectations.

work.name: ByInfinitumServices
work.summary: As the lead developer, I guided a team of five in developing a bureaucracy application. Built with Angular for the frontend and .NET Core for the backend, our focus was set on high-quality coding since we had to pass several Spanish Government's laws. Additionally, leveraging Python for web scraping bolstered our data acquisition capabilities. Our collaborative efforts led to a project that met regulatory standards and surpassed industry expectations.

work.name: LIFE Informatica
work.summary: As the team leader in this retailer, I guided a team of two crafting our company's web presence and online store. Employing WooCommerce and WordPress, we implemented bespoke plugins to enrich functionality. Furthermore, I spearheaded the conceptualization, design, and execution of email marketing initiatives. Our combined efforts yielded a dynamic website, seamless e-commerce platform, and impactful marketing campaigns, fueling business expansion and customer interaction.

work.name: UXLAND BCN
work.summary: Working for ICS (Catalan Health Institute) as main client, I specialized in designing and developing web components using modern technologies such as Polymer 3, LitElement/LitHTML, and Redux. My responsibilities included crafting intuitive user interfaces and ensuring seamless integration of these components into our healthcare systems. Additionally, I led the integration and development of our DevOps system using Travis-CI, streamlining our development processes and enhancing overall project efficiency.

work.name: LIFE Informatica
work.summary: As a Frontend Developer, I played a pivotal role in designing and developing our company's website and e-commerce platform using WooCommerce and WordPress. My responsibilities included custom plugin development to enhance functionality and ensure seamless integration. Additionally, I actively managed our online community, fostering engagement and facilitating interactions to strengthen our brand presence.

work.name: LIFE Informatica
work.summary: As a Computer Technician, I excelled in repairing and mounting all types of computers, ensuring optimal functionality and performance. Additionally, I specialized in the design and installation of LAN and WiFi networks, implementing robust solutions to meet organizational needs. Moreover, I demonstrated proficiency in Linux and Windows server administration, overseeing system configurations and ensuring smooth operations across diverse environments.
